About HoneyInsured

Founded by the friendliest data nerds, HoneyInsured strives to put the best computer technology on your side for a change. Our user-friendly apps can instantly estimate subsidies and health costs, track physicians, and even find the best plans for expectant mothers or self-employed workers. HoneyInsured uses all of the technology and data that corporations use to put the most powerful health technology where it belongs - at your fingertips.

Our Founders

  • Grace Gee , CEO
    Grace Gee wants to fix the healthcare system by arming consumers with the data and technology necessary to make their best health insurance decision. A Magna Cum Laude graduate in Applied Mathematics from Harvard, Grace has worked as a software engineer on Microsoft’s Bing platform team. She is also a recipient of the prestigious 20 Under 20 Thiel Fellowship.
  • Eugene Wang , CTO
    Eugene Wang, co-Founder of HoneyInsured, is the pioneering developer of the advanced research and statistical models that power HoneyInsured. Eugene graduated Top 24 (Junior 24 Phi Beta Kappa) from Harvard University with an Applied Math degree. Eugene has an extensive background in economic research, including his work at Paulson & Co. He was also previously mentioned by the US. Federal Reserve for winning their annual Federal Reserve Challenge.

  • Terms & Privacy

This website is operated by CortexML Inc. DBA HoneyInsured Insurance Services and is not the Health Insurance Marketplace website. In offering this website, HoneyInsured is required to comply with all applicable federal law, including the standards established under 45 C.F.R. 155.220(c) and (d) and standards established under 45 C.F.R. 155.260 to protect the privacy and security of personally identifiable information. This website may not display all data on Qualified Health Plans being offered in your state through the Health Insurance Marketplace website. To see all available data on Qualified Health Plan options in your state, go to Health Insurance Marketplace website at HealthCare.gov.
